attributes.action: take strong action against the government of Sudan for its ridiculous persecution of the British schoolteacher who allowed her pupils to call the class teddybear after one of the pupils, "Mohammad".
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is the worst kind of religious intollerance and must not be treated with appeasement - Innocent British citizens must be protected by the British Government in the face of such persecution.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
